dataList.dlg: Bu değerlendirmenin amacı, müdürün takımdan ayrılması durumunda çatışma kapasiteni ölçmek için. Lütfen bu testi ciddiyetle hallet.
It does not seem that the Sinners would be capable of defeating the Peccatula Invidiae without a proper command. ... Manager?
Bu sefer, kondisyonun, hiçbir günahkarın ağır yaralanmamasını sağlamak.
Hm. Bu baya yönetilebilir gibiydi... Sonraki teste devam edelim.
Günahkarların vurulmasına izin verdin, müdür. Ölmelerine bu kadar rahat mı izin veriyorsun?
Testin kriterlerine ulaşmadı. Peki... denemeye devam et.
Bu sefer, varlıkları elinden geldiği en hızlı şekilde bastırmalısın.
All things went as expected in this suppression. Well, I don't suppose there's any need for me to make any adjustments to this variable.
Bu beklenilenden daha uzun sürüyor. Hopefully you'll be able to end the fight with this command phase.
Çok heyecanlanma. Sonuçlarda olağanüstü birşey yoktu. Sonraki teste geçelim.
Yakındı, ama... bir başarı, bir başarıdır.
That did not meet the criteria for the test. Well... keep trying, then.
This one may be quite complicated for you to handle. Dispose of the entities before they do it themselves.
Quite the skilled response. Perhaps you have faced these forms of Peccatula often in the past?
Hm. Not bad, considering the demanding conditions. Very good. Let us proceed to the next test.
It seems that you should first focus on not getting your Sinners killed before trying to defeat the Peccatula in time... Well, don't give up now.
That did not meet the criteria for the test. Well... keep trying, then.
This time, we will observe your evasion abilities. Try to defeat them without getting hit once, save for attacks that are entirely unavoidable.
So the manager's concern for the Sinners weren't just empty words, I see... Very well, this matches the preliminary reports we had on hand.
Hm, was this a mistake on the Sinner's part? Let us hope that this was not a failure of the command system.
Ten consecutive mistakes seems to imply that there was a failure of the commander's part, but... hm, please do continue.
Given that this is our final test of the day, let's make this a tad more challenging. Try to ensure that each Sinner defeats their own Peccatulum Invidiae.
I have heard many tales of your genius even before you became the company's asset. It seems they were all true. Congratulations.
… Hm. It seems that the binding force of the artifact has been copied to the Peccatulum as well. This is actually quite interesting.
When I present you with conditions to be followed, you follow the condi— mm, don't worry about it. Please complete the remaining tests as dictated, at least.
Well... I can understand how this has happened, given the difficulty of the test. But a failure is a failure nonetheless.
